description.value: Many infosphere fashion sites thrive in the Pact Worlds and are constantly updated by designers with the latest curated collections, and offer subscriptions to ensure their followers are always up-to-date. Each subscription is associated with a specific organization or subculture, such as the Stewards, Pact Worlds dance clubs, or Veskarium corporate culture. The subscription takes form of physical chip you can add to a tier-0 or higher computer (such as a comm unit). As long as you check it briefly each day, you gain a +4 bonus to Culture checks made to recall knowledge related to the associated group’s apparel and fashion.
